Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the TIME magazine cover said Marcos had been acquitted of all corruption cases, when in fact the original cover did not contain this text.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or sources to back up the statement about the TIME magazine cover.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the altered cover image shared on Facebook accurately represents the content of the original TIME magazine cover.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for the altered cover image, such as it being digitally manipulated or created by supporters of the Marcos family.
